author: themostwanteddd
text: Good afternoon. Today I received a freeze on my account, the nickname themostwatneddd. However, I don't understand why. Now I will give arguments. It all started when I put out a Dior saddle bag. A few days ago, all the photos were taken clearly and in accordance with the rules. I contacted a Dior representative in my country this morning. We talked to them about this issue and they told me that they can not help and also do not understand the reason for these letters. text: I have been in Grailed platform since 2018 and have never had problems buying things from there, but after a few months I decided to sell some designer clothes that cost quite a lot of money, anyway I created the ads and I put the ads in grailed, as usual it takes up to 24 hours for the ads to be published publicly, but in my case they were never published, my ads were removed from nowhere, I do not know what is going on until I found out that Grailed sent a message to me who claims that my clothes are fake and that I break their rules, how the hell are my clothes fake if I have put pictures on labels and all I have to prove that my clothes are not fake? the logic does not exist in their world, I am very frustrated that I unfortunately can no longer keep changing my ads and do everything to prove that my clothes are not fake but genuine, I have tried to publish my clothes five times now and still they send messages that my clothes are fake, therefore I do not rate their customer service good, worst staff, believe me.

author: Alyssa A
text: Bought a lock necklace that promised a key in the description. Seller told me after I received the item that there was never a key. I politely ask for a swap, he tries to squeeze more money out of me. This goes on for days. I almost just paid the money but then I was like “why am I paying for his mistake?” I ask for a refund/return and he finally offers the swap instead but I’m done. I’m upset I even have to deal with this and I don’t want to go through it again with a swap. I complain to the website about him. I also write a review. Turns out he also works there (!!) and deletes my honest review. No one has answered my customer complaints either. Then the seller replaces it with his own 5 star review through my account!!! I would never give 5 stars for this experience so why is it on my account & its unchangeable? Unethical. Can’t make this up. I just want to warn other people. Avoid this site.

author: Danverkart
text:
I tried to add the authentic Jordan 1 Retro High Purple 10.5 US to my profile for what Grailed wrote to me that the pair is inauthentic. I immediately added a pair again with the same photos, they replied that they needed more photos, I did everything they asked and added another photos. I have a 5 star review for a $550 sold item! And in the coming days I should have one more perfect review.

author: Milo Danilovic
text:
RE: request (533908)
My account was frozen for no reason. I contacted Grailed and they replied :"Your Grailed account has been frozen for exhibiting patterns of fraudulent activity. At Grailed, we value the trust and safety of our community and we reserve the right to freeze accounts that are inconsistent with our expectations. Your account is permanently frozen and you will not be allowed to create any future accounts." (end of quote). This statement/ accusation is completely false and very insulting for that matter. This is all wrong since I only used the site to buy 2 items and everything was good with transactions, I paid and received these two items and were happy with purchases. None of things that can be remotely fraudulent were done, I never sold on Grailed, never listed anything, only 2 very simple transactions, paid through the site. If someone points gun at my head and says "tell me why possibly could you get banned on Grailed or I will shoot you" I would not have any idea what to tell. This is an insane experience. Looks like my account just randomly got frozen for no reason.
